Old Schoolhouse Mystery

I have reason to believe that strange
phenomena have been occurring in
the old schoolhouse of late.

As such, I would like to request
that one or more combat-ready students
look into this and report back to me.

For more details, come see me in my
office on the first floor of the main
building.
                 --Principal Vandyck

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Principal Vandyck entrusted me with the key to
the old schoolhouse. It seems as though strange
things are afoot in there, so I'm going to need
to check it out.

・I made my way to the staircase room and
something is definitely weird here.

・The structure of the building
appears to have changed completely...
I should explore everywhere I can.

・I defeated a powerful foe in what seemed
to be the deepest area of the ruins.
Now's a good time to head back out.

・I reported the results of my
investigation to Principal Vandyck!
Orbal Delivery

I've just finished repairing a bunch
of orbal tech here at the Engineering
Club, but I need someone to deliver
everything.

Stop by the engineering building (left
of the Student Union building) and I'll
tell you more.
            --George, Year 2, Class III

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・George gave me three items to deliver:
1) An orbal scale, to be delivered to Nicholas,
head of the Cooking Club. I'll find him in the
home ec room on the second floor of the main
building.
2) An antique orbal lamp, which is bound for
Micht at the pawn shop.
3) An orbal wristwatch belonging to Michael,
the director of Radio Trista.
・I delivered the orbal scale to Nicholas.
・I delivered the antique orbal lamp to Micht.
・I delivered the orbal wristwatch to Michael.

・I've delivered all three items safe and sound.
Better tell George.
・Checked in with George. Request complete!
A Noteworthy Loss

I kind of dropped my student notebook,
and now I can't find it anywhere.

Would anyone be willing to help me look?

I'll be looking for it on the first floor
of the Student Union building, and I'd
really appreciate it if someone lent me
a hand.
              ~Colette, Year 1, Class IV

・Colette filled me in on what happened and we
agreed to split up and search. I'll be checking
the main building and focusing on corridors
and rest areas. She has an inkling that it's
on the second floor, but we'll see.

・I found Colette's student notebook on the
second floor of the main building. I better
take it back to her.
・Colette's notebook is back in her hands!

・Once I'd explained the situation, Ramsay was

to get these to Fred!
・I gave Fred the seasoning he needed!
East Celdic Highway Monster

A dangerous monster has appeared near
the highway and is making it very
difficult for us to harvest our crops.
Could someone please help us?

Monster: Scary Dinosaur
Location: A plateau near the East Celdic
Highway.

My house is alongside the East Celdic
Highway, so please stop by if you can.
                         --Syro

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・We asked Syro to tell us everything he knew
about the monster. It sounds even more dangerous
than the name suggests, so we have to make sure
that we're ready to face it.
・Monster defeated! It wasn't really THAT scary...

・We told Syro the details of our battle,
completing his request!
Any Bright Ideas?

I need someone to replace a
malfunctioning orbment light in a
road lamp for me.

For more details, see me at
Oddvin's Arms & Orbal Factory.
                          --Samus

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Samus gave us an orbment light.
・We need to use it to replace a road lamp
near the windmill in front of Lunaria Nature
Park. We can find the park at the end of the
West Celdic Highway.
・We're going to need to open a maintenance
panel before we can replace it, though.
The code to unlock it is 466515.

・As soon as we arrived at the road lamp,
monsters began to show up. Luckily, the others
agreed to cover me while I replaced the light.

・I typed in the code without any problems and
replaced the light in a blink.
We should go tell Samus.

・I messed up the code, which slowed down the
whole process... At least it all worked out
in the end. We should go tell Samus.

・We told Samus that the light was installed
and shining bright!

Old Schoolhouse Mystery II

I would like to ask Class VII to

walls.

down to the second floor. We're going to need

・We defeated a powerful enemy in the deepest
area of the second floor. That's probably
about it for us for the day.

・We successfully completed our
investigation of the old schoolhouse.

Underground Passage Monster

My name is Noble. I run the Der Himmel
hotel which, unfortunately, currently
has a monster lurking beneath it.

If you can get rid of it, please see me
at my hotel in the Garnier District.
                          --Noble

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・We visited Noble's hotel, but he seemed
to be away. We'll have to check again
when we're finished with our other obligations.

・Noble gave us the key to the passage
under the hotel. We should take care
of this quickly, but preparedly.

・Target eliminated. Let's go back to
the hotel and give Noble our report.

・We gave our report at the hotel,
completing yet another request.
Hat's Off

A customer who visited my gelato
stall yesterday accidentally dropped
their hat.

I'd like to get it back to them, but
I'm not sure how. If you have any good
ideas, please visit my stall in
Dreichels Plaza.
                         --Jasmine

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Jasmine left the hat in our care and
we agreed to search for its owner.
・She says he's from the Ost District.
We'll start our search at Gamgee's pub,
since Machias knows the man who runs it.

・We spoke with Gamgee, who shed some
light on the hat's owner.
・His name is Jim and he lives in a house
near the pub. All we have to do is leave
the pub, take a slight right, and follow
the steps down. Piece of cake.

・We visited Jim's home, but his wife
informed us that he had stepped out.
・He apparently just left, so he shouldn't
have gone too far from home yet...

・We found Jim at the tram stop. Just as
we were returning his hat, his wife showed
up and they both thanked us.
・We've let Jasmine know that the hat
situation has been sorted out!
Chronicles of the Chronicle

A journalist at the Imperial Chronicle
needs assistance with a tourism piece
he's preparing.

For more information, speak to me at
reception in our office on Vainqueur
Street and I will connect you two.
                        --Citron

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Norton explained that he's producing a
tourist brochure for the Summer Festival
and asked us to get photos of and a

・There are five places we need to visit:
1) Weston House, in Plaza Bifrost
2) Mimosa, in Plaza Bifrost
3) Watson's Weapons & Armor
4) Lumiere Orbal Factory
5) Le Sage Boutique

・Received a comment from Mimosa!

・Received a comment from

・Received a comment from

Amber Amour

One of my cafe's most popular records
has been shattered.

If possible, I'd like to get another
record of the same song, but I need
help. Visit me at the Concert Cafe - 
Etoile on Alto Street for further
information.
                        --Heming

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・The smashed record was a thirty-year-old
song named 'Amber Amour.'
・We thought that Fiona might know something,
so we went over to Elliot's house.

・Fiona suggested that we ask at the
reception desk in Plaza Bifrost.
That's on Vainqueur Street.

・The receptionist at Plaza Bifrost told us
that the record was sold out everywhere and
that the only way to secure a copy would be
to order it directly from the manufacturer. Yikes.
・But she did tell us to check out Emmrod's,
a secondhand store in the Ost District.
We might luck out and find it there.

・We finally managed to get our hands on
a used copy of 'Amber Amour.' Let's get
it back to Heming as soon as we can.

・We gave Heming his record, and Etoile
finally has its signature song back!
Heimdallr Port Monster

A terrifying monster has been sighted
in an underground waterway near
Heimdallr port.

Confirm the specifics with Danberto the
port chief, then eliminate the creature.

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・We took the key to the underground
waterway from Danberto. We can get in
through a door farther into the port.

・The waterways are safe once again!
Let's get out of here and tell Danberto.

・We told Danberto that we
defeated the monster!
Made for Walkin'

I need someone to test a new product.

Come to Le Sage on Vainqueur Street
and I'll tell you more.
                         --Howard

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Howard gave us a pair of Ladies' Stregas.
・Laura's going to have to walk two

・Laura walked over two thousand steps in the
Stregas and we told Howard how they held up.
Oh No, Nono!

Our family's kitten has gone missing.

If you can help us, please visit us in our
home in the Ost District for more details.
                         --Keaton

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Keaton's family told us all about their
missing kitten, Nono. She has white fur and is
very timid... She shouldn't have strayed too far.
・The family's already asked the residents'
association to help them search indoors, so we
only need to look outdoors in the Ost District.

・We spotted two brown cats -- a mother and a
kitten -- in northern Ost.

・We spotted a black and white cat in
southern Ost.
・We spotted a gray cat in eastern Ost.

・We spotted Mr. Tiddles, the leader
of all the cats in Ost. Let's go
after him and see what we find!
・Yes! We brought Nono back!
Burglary at the Jewelers

It seems a burglary has taken place at
a jewelers in the Garnier District
called San Corries.

We should head over and find out what
happened as soon as possible!

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・The owner, Cordelia, told us that the culprit
was the famous Phantom Thief B, and that he'd
specifically called us out for some sort of
treasure hunt.
・While it feels like we're walking into a trap,
if we can get the stolen Crimson Tiara back, we
need to try. Our first clue: 'At the feet of
the conqueror with the heart of a lion.'

・We found our next card at the feet of the
statue of Emperor Dreichels in Dreichels Plaza.
On it was another clue, reading 'In the
northeastern seat of the prismatic palace.'

・We found another card attached to the
northeast bench in the Crystal Garden. Our next
clue: 'At the round table where once rested the
gauntlets that supported the east of the city.'
・Right after that, we ran into Baron Bleublanc.
I don't know what he's after, but he gives me
a weird feeling...

・We found another card, this one attached to
the legs of the table on the second floor of the
guild where we were staying. Its clue says:
'On the bottom of the white burden of the steel
bird perched at the water's edge.'

・We headed to Heimdallr Port and asked the
chief there to check the bottom of the
containers near the large crane. Lo and behold,
we found another card.
・The seemingly-final clue also appears to
point to Heimdallr Port: 'The crimson crown
you seek sleeps within a black ark, nestled
in the steel car that marches with the minutes.'
・The driver agreed to let us look inside the tram.

・We safely recovered the Crimson Tiara
from inside the tram.
・We then learned that the driver we spoke
to was the Phantom Thief B -- or Bleublanc,
as he introduced himself -- in disguise. We
still don't know what he's after, though.
・Even though we couldn't capture him, we
were able to recover the tiara. We checked
in with the local government and reported
back to Cordelia at San Corries.
In Case of Emergency

A tourist from Crossbell by the name of
Bond seems to have swapped suitcases
with someone else by mistake.

Let's see if we can find whoever that
was and get this mixup sorted out.

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Apparently the person who has Bond's
briefcase has plans to watch the parade
from the Garnier District. Let's move.

・We talked to a man running a juice stall in
the Garnier District and he told us that the
person we're looking for was looking for a
place to rest, so he recommended the Alto
District. Let's see if he's at Concert
Cafe - Etoile.

・We found the man with Bond's briefcase
and solved the suitcase situation!

why am I suddenly hungry for cookies?
Slipped Their Minds

A number of students have yet to collect
their permission slips to serve food
and drinks at the festival. Given that
it's imperative that everyone doing so
has a slip, I need them delivered today.

For more details, speak to me in the
infirmary.
                --Instructor Beatrix

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・Instructor Beatrix gave me four slips
to deliver to the following four people.
1) Nicholas in the Cooking Club
2) Colette, a first year in Class IV
3) Becky, who's running her own stall.
4) Hugo, who's also running one of his.

・I went to the Cooking Club's clubroom,
but it seems like Nicholas went out to
buy supplies. I guess I'll have to find
him at Brandon's General Goods.
・I delivered Nicholas' permission slip.

・Colette wasn't in Class IV's first-year
classroom, but I heard she was in their
second-year classroom. Better get going.
・I delivered Colette's permission slip.

・I delivered Hugo and Becky's
permission slips.

・Now that I've delivered all four
permission slips, I should let
Instructor Beatrix know.

・I reported back to Instructor
Beatrix, completing her request!
We Read the Comments

We're doing a special feature here at
Radio Trista on the academy festival,
but we're running a little short on
comments. Anyone want to collect the
ones we need for me?

For more specifics, come see me in
the Radio Trista building.
    --Michael, director at Radio Trista

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・I need to collect comments from:
1) A Class I first year
2) A Class V first year
3) The Occult Research Society
・I received a comment from Ferris.

・I checked the training hall, but it turns
out Munk was in charge of making the
comment and he wasn't there. He might
be in the lower class dormitory, though.
・I received a comment from Munk.
・I received a comment from Beryl.

・I've gathered all three comments.
Time to let Michael know.

・I gave Michael the comments, so the
feature should go off without a hitch!
Mail Mixup

Our class received a package that
clearly wasn't meant for us.

We want to get it to whichever class
ordered it, but we're too swamped with
our preparations to ask around. Could
someone please deliver this for us?

We'll be outside Class II's second-year
classroom preparing for the festival.
Please come see us if you can help.
             --Bridget, Year 1, Class II

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・I picked up the package that'd been delivered
to Class II only to find cones inside... These
are probably going to be used for something on
the field.

・It turns out the cones were meant for the
Riding Club. Not only did they not get their
package, but they got another one full of
newly-printed books, too. Now I have to figure
out who these are for...

・I took the books to the bookstore and,
unsurprisingly, I was entrusted with yet another
package. This one contains copies of a handmade
short story anthology.

・Once I delivered the anthologies, I was given
a package full of expensive-looking ornaments.
Given that Class II's contribution to the
festival has a fancy name like 'Stella Garten'...

・We've finally come full circle. All of
the packages have been properly delivered!
Duly Noted

The vice principal seems to have lost
his notebook, and he seems desperate to
find it again. I'd like to help him out,
but it'd be easier if I knew where to
start...

#666c　　　　          ◆　　　　◆　　　　◆
・He mentioned something about dropping it
when he was on the roof of the main building...

・It seems as though the vice principal was
facing out into the courtyard at one point,
but moved toward the academy field with his
notebook in hand. So maybe...

・Apparently, a group of students found
something next to the field and headed off
somewhere quiet to look at it.

・Rex and his group of friends gave me a black
leather notebook. I should return this to the
vice principal a.s.a.p.

・I gave the vice principal his notebook
back and learned all about Rixia Mao!
Academy Festival Patrol

I've agreed to help the Student Council
during the festival. I'll be walking
around and seeing if anyone needs help.

・A couple asked me about Class III's
attraction and I was able to guide them properly!

・A couple asked me about Class III's
attraction and I couldn't help them out...

・A girl on the rooftop has dropped her Mishy
plush. She apparently had it just a while ago,
so I should look around the main building for it.

・I found the girl's Mishy plush in the
main building and returned it to her!

・Becky asked me to find and deliver her ten
packs of Course Rock Salt.
・I gave Becky the salt she needed!

・A boy's balloon has been caught in a tree
near the field. I'll have to borrow a ladder
from the janitor to get it down.
・I rescued the boy's balloon!

・I found Vanilla lost in front of the old
schoolhouse. I should let Instructor Makarov
know where she is.
・I told Instructor Makarov about Vanilla!
